metadata.title: CVE-2021-3991 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An Improper Authorization vulnerability exists in Dolibarr versions priorto the 'develop' branch. A user with restricted permissions in the'Reception' section is able to access specific reception details via directURL access, bypassing the intended permission restrictions.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
